item.title: Confidence intervals for longitudinal models in R
item.description: The following plot combines a spaghetti plot for individual patient trajectories with the regression line as calculated by a linear model. The confidence interval of the regression line is shown as a grey ribbon around the line. # Libraries necessary for this plot library(emmeans) library(ggplot2) library(lme4) # Only needed for the data set ## Warning: Paket 'lme4' wurde unter R Version 4.0.5 erstellt ## Lade n√∂tiges Paket: Matrix # Data and regression model data(sleepstudy) mod <- lm(Reaction ~ Days, data=sleepstudy) gr <- ref_grid(mod, cov.
